description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4lk19","text":"The protocol covers the steps to measure neuromelanin-positive neuron density in substantia nigra using image analysis tools including NZConnect (Hamamatsu), a web-based whole-slide image (WSI) viewer, Cellpose and QuPath.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bbavf","text":"Manually annotate the substantia nigra on NZConnect (Hamamatsu), a web-based whole-slide image (WSI) viewer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":9}],"data":{}},{"key":"5h765","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D0720A0FE50A11ED820D0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.hamamatsu.com/jp/en/product/life-science-and-medical-systems/digital-slide-scanner/U16179-01.html"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"34fff","text":"Download the annotations using a Python script, and then import into QuPath [1] using a Groovy script","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":88,"length":13}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D5DADF36E50A11ED820D0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://groovy-lang.org"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9jgq9","text":"Segment neuromelanin cells using Cellpose [2,3] via the QuPath Cellpose extension [4], followed by an object classifier to filter out non-specific detections. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":45,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":83,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"EA2E0CE024AE11EE90DC1736F55950E3","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/the-impact-of-mg149-a-kat8-inhibitor-on-mitophagy-cuw7wxhn"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"F4330D8024AE11EE90DC1736F55950E3","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/the-impact-of-mg149-a-kat8-inhibitor-on-mitophagy-cuw7wxhn"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"1CA4995024AF11EE90DC1736F55950E3","url":"https://github.com/BIOP/qupath-extension-cellpose"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5tqqe","text":"Calculate neuromelanin-positive cell density by the number of neuromelanin-positive cells divided by the area of the region of interest (neuromelanin-positive cells per mm^2).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"98ho","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9d63o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8t3ml","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"djpdq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"10bqe","text":"
